name: synapse
description: Synapse is a reference Matrix homeserver implementation, enabling self-hosted federated chat. It powers encrypted messaging, VoIP, and bridging with a robust API surface.
features: Matrix homeserver: Hosts Matrix chat server for federated messaging.
End-to-end encryption: Encrypts messages and calls with Olm and Megolm protocols.
Federation: Connects with other Matrix servers for decentralized communication.
Room management: Creates public and private chat rooms with customizable permissions.
Voice and video: Supports encrypted voice and video calls via WebRTC.
File sharing: Sends encrypted files and media through chat rooms.
Bridges: Connects to IRC, Slack, Discord, and other platforms via bridges.
User directory: Searches for users across federated Matrix network.
Admin API: Manages server, users, and rooms via comprehensive REST API.
Push notifications: Sends notifications to mobile devices for new messages.
SSO integration: Authenticates users via SAML, OAuth, or LDAP.
Moderation tools: Provides admin controls for managing users and content.
